title: Holy Dragon Totem - Novel Updates
author: 风青阳
description:
Dragon, identical to nine animals in form.

The head is similar with that of a camel, the horn is similar with that of a deer, eye of a rabbit, the ear with that of an ox, the neck with that of a snake, the belly that of a sea serpent, the scale that of a fish, the claw with that of an eagle, and the paw with that of a tiger.

The ancestors had the holy dragon as their totem, farming the land and passing down life.

The holy dragon ruled all realms under the heaven and beneath the sea.

We, the descedents of the dragon, will rule once more.>
